website_summaries.verdict: A good buy if you prefer wallpaper with a smooth finish, but the VeryBerrySticker is easier to apply and less costly.
pros: A washable option w/a smooth finish
Trellis design w/soft colors compliments most room décor
cons: It's on the thin side, so it tends to wrinkle during the hanging process
Pre-pasting doesn't always stick very well

customer_reviews.title: So easy!!
customer_reviews.text: 1st time wallpaper hanger, went on the unconventional way. My husband and I found that cutting our piece then spraying the back as we went moved a lot faster. This was faster than painting our kids bathroom with our appraiser coming the following day. Only needed 1 ft from the 2nd package and walls are 9ft + high there is also an alcove area behind door that was wallpapered.excellent product If my reviews help, please Like it below
customer_reviews.author: Goddess Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to apply it by myself although, I would recommend having someone help you.I absolutely love it! I would definitely get it wetter than the directions say and purchase a roller to help smooth it out. It appears like it has bubbles right after you apply it but they will come out by the time it dries! I took a picture of a seam, they are difficult to see in person.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Held strong for almost 3 years!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to give my kitchen a face lift and buy some time to save and plan for a full renovation. It held like a champ for almost 3 years. This was pretty easy to work with during installation. A few pieces didn't stick well but I just re-wet them and they were fine. It held up to lots of kitchen splatters and wiped clean easily with water or some cleanser. My only compliant is that I couldn't get a seamless installation, but I'm not sure that anyone noticed where the pieces meet except me. I'm now planning on getting some for a bathroom facelift!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Attractive wall addition
customer_reviews.text: I cannot review other than fact that I am very pleased with the design and color of wallpaper for its designated use. I have not had time yet to install this wallpaper, so I cannot rate adhesion, installation ease, or ease of use at this time. I can say that it was delivered ahead of stated delivery date and in good condition. I am excited to see the transformation of room once it is installed.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: The paper is beautiful and very good quality paper
customer_reviews.text: The paper is beautiful and very good quality paper, love it ... HOWEVER, the tool you use on their website to estimate what you need is not accurate ... I BARELY had enough for the square footage I entered. Technically, I didn't have enough but because the pattern is very easy to match, I was able to patch over a door and under a cabinet to allow me enough to finish a wall.
customer_reviews.author: FussFamily5

customer_reviews.title: First time wallpapering!
customer_reviews.text: First time wallpaper experience and it was not bad! There is a learning curve with cutting around outlets, and lining up the patter, but overall it was pretty smooth! Outcome was great. Wallpaper didnt get too thin and rip and the adhesive was easy to work with. Definitely recommend this, even for first timers!
customer_reviews.author: Harristotle

customer_reviews.title: The design and pattern is huge!
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to use this to cover a backsplash area. The pictures are misleading. I wish I would have read through the reviews. I didn't return it due to the restocking fee. I have very expensive craft paper now.
customer_reviews.author: Marla Jo

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I really like how it turn out. My daughter help me to put the wall paper it was the our first time we did this and it was pain no because the wall paper that is really easy to handle if you follow the instructions but because all the measurements and matching patterns.
customer_reviews.author: Elena B

customer_reviews.title: Love the pattern, maybe not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: Overall happy with the product but a little faded in some parts which they said I could have sent back for, but on a deadline I really didn’t want to wait so we used it anyway. Easy to install in terms of wallpaper.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Love this wallpaper in my laundry room
customer_reviews.text: I love this wallpaper! I bought 2 rolls for my laundry room and it was the finishing touch it needed! Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: but overall like the design
customer_reviews.text: a bit tough to manipulate while applying- left slight puckerings in spots, but overall like the design...
customer_reviews.author: szsilverpoet

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty wallpaper
customer_reviews.text: Wallpaper is very pretty. However, hard to install and white of wallpaper is thin and can see inner wallpaper of old home through it. Can only install on flat white wall for best result.
customer_reviews.author: Neil S

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! Thicker paper and easier to put up than ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Thicker paper and easier to put up than expected. For us the spray bottle wasn't enough water so we just squirted water from a water bottle and rubbed it on the wallpaper with our hands. I also sponged the paste-for-prepasted-wallpaper onto the wall, and it definitely helped; no lifting at the seams or elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So pretty!
customer_reviews.text: It looks absolutely stunning on my wall going downstairs to my basement, however it was a pain in the butt to put up! It took two of us to put it up, but it was worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: joshua simon

customer_reviews.title: Best wall covering I've installed in years!
customer_reviews.text: High quality paper & glue; perfect pattern match.Incredibly easy to install. Don't let the 'decal' description scare you away. It's still prepasted wall paper. I did accent walls in not one but two kitchens and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This wallpaper looks great. Exactly like I hoped it would look from the pictures and description. It was not difficult to apply and seemed to have no quality issues. I had to cover 40 sq. feet and the double roll ran just shy. Measure carefully!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L. White

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time putting wall paper up. It was a little challenging at first because I'm a newbie but once my husband and I got the hang of it, it wasn't that bad. I will say that the grey color is a little more on the taupe side than grey. Just FYI!
customer_reviews.author: Evinnie Casanova

customer_reviews.title: Paint walls white before installation.
customer_reviews.text: Love the pattern but paper thin so having to paint walls white so you can't see beige paint. Have not installed yet.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Barker

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Looks great in my house and easy pattern to match.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on bathroom wall
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on bathroom wall! Recommend to anyone renovating a room. The color of the pattern is more of a brownish gray instead of straight up gray
customer_reviews.author: Ronald W. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to work with - very rich looking
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love this wallpaper. Put in a half bath with white subway tile trimmed in black. Black and white marble floor. Couldn't be more pleased. The wallpaper is stunning, very rich looking with a traditional, modern look. Very easy to work with also.
customer_reviews.author: marcia w.

customer_reviews.title: Love the look!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look on an accent wall in our living room. Easy application.
customer_reviews.author: Janet M. Forrester

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Great product, adhesion and repositions was a breeze. The patterns didn’t exactly line up all the way down the seam so I had some overlapping. Not an issue since it is in a laundry closet. Wouldn’t want that overlap in a living space though.
customer_reviews.author: sabrina brugger

customer_reviews.title: Coverage Area
customer_reviews.text: The description is misleading. It’s not clear on how there is. I ordered this thinking it was 2 rolls of 56 sq ft each. It is only 1 roll of 56 sq ft.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous paper!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put on the back wall of my kitchen cabinets. I love seeing the pattern when I open the doors. I've received LOTS of compliments on it. The paper has glue, but I was looking for a temporary placement so I used double stick tape. It's holding up well. Buy a little extra so you can match up the pattern when you put it side-by-side.
customer_reviews.author: Truebie

customer_reviews.title: Very Forgiving....newbie friendly! !
customer_reviews.text: Very forgiving material! I was not graceful at all putting this paper up. It was all wadded up at one point or another on the trip from the bathtub (I used it to dip the paper in) and the wall and it still smoothed out nicely. Wasted several feet by not making sure to match up the patterns but I was only doing an accent wall so there was plenty to spare. Gorgeous print. Bold statement
customer_reviews.author: kpdgal

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pattern
customer_reviews.text: Love the pattern. Easy to put up. My only complaint would be it rips easily when trying to cut the excess off. But after realizing that we were just extra careful.
customer_reviews.author: Cflesch14

customer_reviews.title: Timeless elegance
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this wallpaper!! I didn't want the commitment of permanent on the walls because that's just too much much to take down if my taste changes but this is the perfect solution. It is very elegant and one day I will do other rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pattern. Instructions were easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pattern. Instructions were easy to follow. Product was easy to apply. Used this to decorate the exterior walls of an Ikea Expedit.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Ignacio

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Used this paper on accent wall in my guest room. It was easy to install, and good quality paper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product and quick delivery. Paper is not heavy weight. It worked perfect for our ikea bookshelves.
customer_reviews.author: Özlem A.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, and easy to put up!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to put up. I used a paint brush and water to moisten the back, and used a squeegee to get any air bubbles out. It looks great in my kitchen and is easy to clean if anything gets on it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely wallpaper. Classic design.
customer_reviews.text: Love this wallpaper and have received so many compliments. My only warning is that it is not a forgiving pattern. Not recommended on uneven walls. It is a nightmare to line up. Otherwise such a nice investment.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Hard to activate all glue
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty and once on it's great. It is hard to activate all the glue though. You have to really wet it WELL.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Aguayo

customer_reviews.title: Wall paper looks great but glue is not great
customer_reviews.text: The glue does not affix very well to the wall. The pattern is simple to match however to give a clean look. I've seen much thicker wall paper for the same price. If there are any imperfections in the wall (ie: painting lump, spackle) it will show a dimple through the wall paper.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lepine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Nothing but positive comments from people who have seen this in the small closets where it has been used. Very chic without going overboard.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Very good !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful wallpaper, easy to hang. we used it for an accent wall in our dining room and it totally transformed the space!
customer_reviews.author: cmg

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: So cute and super easy to install! I put it up by myself in about an hour (I used it to cover the interior of a closet)
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Love this wallpaper
customer_reviews.text: Love this wallpaper. I put it up inside my vintage camper trailer. It was so easy to install with a simple spray bottle and wallpaper squeegee.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: simple beautiful design
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and the design is timeless. It went in my laundry room as an accent wall and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: The wallpaper is beautiful, however it is not an exact match as ...
customer_reviews.text: The wallpaper is beautiful, however it is not an exact match as described and there was quite a bit of wasted wallpaper for our project. Beautiful design though, looks AMAZING on the walls...just used more paper than anticipated and didn't line up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wallpaper! I used it to spruce up the staircase over wood paneling and it looks so much better. It's easy to use, especially for my first time!!! The quality is great too :)
customer_reviews.author: Linda Panagiotidis

customer_reviews.title: pretty
customer_reviews.text: looks awesome- my husband and I got it hung on one accent wall in about 2/3 hours! everyone who sees it loves it!
customer_reviews.author: M. Stelmach

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! My husband and I had never done wallpaper before and I was so nervous attempting to do so. But it was an easy process. Definitely a two person job for our 11' high wall, but the results are amazing I've had so many compliments about our wall!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Merrill

customer_reviews.title: Nice and perfect for my kitchen wall backsplash
customer_reviews.text: Nice and perfect for my kitchen wall backsplash. It is sturdy enough to make it easy to handle, and it went up quickly and easily.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: We definitely got what we paid for!
customer_reviews.text: Love the paper, very easy to hang. Great strength. Just beautiful on my wall. Delivery was spot on. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you submerge wallpaper in water
customer_reviews.text: Instructions say to spray the back of the paper we did this and it didn't turnout good. The seams showed very bad. We tore it down and submerged the bar in water and it looks amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This wallpaper was perfect! Very easy to put up too.
customer_reviews.author: evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to do for first timers
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely stunning. Very easy to do for first timers!!! Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: JHowell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on and when can time to taking ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and when can time to taking it off (moving) it was a breeze! I definitely recommend putting it on with at least one other person and cut up your pieces to fit the wall before getting wet (create the adhesive). It made a beautiful accent wall for our bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: Devon Ericksen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It turned out beautifully, but it is short in width.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Baker

customer_reviews.title: I'd rather use stick on
customer_reviews.text: Adhesive is difficult to activate - about half of my panels are peeling.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney D

customer_reviews.title: Good simple design.  Eye catching.
customer_reviews.text: great wall paper. used it in my pantry easy pattern to line up
customer_reviews.author: Heather Nitschke

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the paper, the paper was easy to handle, I received lots of compliments.After going thru 3 other designs, I am very satisfied with this one. Just be careful: paper is pasted and a few spots did not have any paste, causing it to fall. I had to call the wallpaper hanger back to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Corbishley

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you order enough. I got halfway done ...
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you order enough. I got halfway done and had to order more and the lot color must have changed and color is off:/
customer_reviews.author: danielle carroll

customer_reviews.title: very trendy!
customer_reviews.text: Used this to cover some awful vinyl in my bathroom - going to use it on kitchen cabinets next - I hope they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Gorg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the.look. We used it.on the head wall of our bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: kai

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. bought for my kitchen and it looks
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. bought for my kitchen and it looks great
customer_reviews.author: armando t. bess

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I actually used this print to cover my old fridge. It's awesome and I LOVE it. Relatively easy to put up and does come right off and all you need to do is wipe down the surface to make sure the tackiness is off. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful wallpaper. Beautiful pattern, and easy to put up. It made my small bathroom look twice as big.
customer_reviews.author: mimi k.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and easy to hang
customer_reviews.text: Great product and easy to hang, I cut the paper to size and then wet with a roller rather than dip in a bucket or the tub. Only small negative is that I expected more so have had to order another roll.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wallpaper! Used it to line a bookcase. I was easy to cut and very thick. I didn't use the the glue on it I used double sided tape, but it was perfect for what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love this wallpaper!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hang! Love that it was a straight match!
customer_reviews.author: Toni Goble

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this pattern-looks good with just about anything because its neutral!!
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Nivala

customer_reviews.title: Wallpaper
customer_reviews.text: Turn out great . If I had one suggestion , you need to spray more water on the paper than they suggest
customer_reviews.author: rick b

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and awesome look!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wall paper! Has very sophisticated look and the quality is awesome! it already has glue in the back so all we had to do is to soak in in water and put it on the wall! (just follow the easy instruction in the pamphlet) No need to buy glue and brushes!!! Super easy to put on the wall ! Thank you very much! Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Igal N.

customer_reviews.title: Graphic Trellis Wallpaper
customer_reviews.text: Good quality wallpaper. Paste adheres well, easy to hang. Hides minor imperfections on wall underneath. Looks very nice! Product received quickly and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Mashiba

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This wallpaper was easy to put up and the quality was great! Make sure you compute how many rolls you will need according to the size of your wall. I needed 2 rolls.
customer_reviews.author: Nani Randall

customer_reviews.title: A
customer_reviews.text: From the prompt delivery to the product 5 stars for excellence.
customer_reviews.author: Juan J Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great style addition to a room
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy a little detail in my decor and after trying painting stencil patterns (which is about my least favorite thing to do) this was the best purchase I made in the redecorating of my living room. It really was easy to put up and it looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: BrookeS

customer_reviews.title: I’d like a chance to find a design which is actually ...
customer_reviews.text: The pattern is what I expected, the color is very disappointing. It’s truly gray , not beige at all. I’d like a chance to find a design which is actually beige!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia McAllister

customer_reviews.title: Love the design of this wallpaper
customer_reviews.text: Love the design of this wallpaper. It has a vintage modern feel and is super durable. This was my first time wallpapering and it held up through all my repositioning. I used paste for prepasted wallpaper and didn't let it book as long as I probably should have and it still turned out awesome! I have gotten lots of compliments. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Haggerty

customer_reviews.title: You've shipped me 2 samples when I just paid $70 ...
customer_reviews.text: You've shipped me 2 samples when I just paid $70 for over 2 walls worth of wall paper, and I have someone coming to put it up tomorrow and don't even have the right product. Overnight the correct items to make right.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler C Klein

customer_reviews.title: but looks great. The colour is white with a medium grey ...
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey, but looks great. The colour is white with a medium grey trellis pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallpaper at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Stylish, easy to hang, thick wallpaper The white is a bright white. The gray has beige undertones so fits well with gray or beige decor. I hung this wallpaper over an old plaid paper and the old paper did not show through.
customer_reviews.author: John in Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality heavy paper, I did not put it on a wall but on the back of a china cabinet, and it even covered some imperfections. I have some left and will use it for other projects.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Just put this up today. Hanging wallpaper is challenging but this wallpaper went up very well. I love the difference it made as a feature wall in my living room. The only advice I have is to order enough because I ordered one roll and I only did a half- wall that has a fireplace and two windows and used every bit of it!
customer_reviews.author: Kyla R.

customer_reviews.title: The wallpaper is nice, but it says double roll so i didnt ...
customer_reviews.text: The wallpaper is nice, but it says double roll so i didnt mind spending $45 each. But when i got it it was the same size as a regular roll and i ended up having to buy 3 so called double rolls, i was doing this in my hall way and i only used 1 and a half rolls for the bottom so if those rolls are double rolls it took 6 rolls to do the top and only 1 1/2 for the bottom i feel like i have been robbed!
customer_reviews.author: April I Plourde

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped faster than they said! Wonderful quality and I just love the wallpaper. I couldn't find anything like this at my local store and this was just perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: mb2018

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product
customer_reviews.text: My first time hanging wallpaper and this product was great. My husband and I aren't even getting a divorce over it!
customer_reviews.author: Fosterchic

product_meta.title: York Wallcoverings Peek-A-Boo Graphic Trellis Removable Wallpaper, White/Soft Taupe Grey
product_meta.description:
Color:white/soft taupe gray| Size Name:WallpaperLovely and fresh, this open trellis design is a versatile gem, sure to please in any room of the house. Graphic lines hint at Moroccan inspiration with a clean updated look that adds impact to walls while keeping them light and airy. Crisp white backgrounds set the stage for sophisticated trellis accent colors in black, yellow, pink, lavendar, turquoise and a soft new gray. Made in the USA.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Lovely and fresh, this open trellis design is a versatile gem, sure to please in any room of the house. Graphic lines hint at Moroccan inspiration with a clean updated look that adds impact to walls while keeping them light and airy. Crisp white backgrounds set the stage for sophisticated trellis accent colors in black, yellow, pink, lavendar, turquoise and a soft new gray. Made in the USA.
feature_bullets: Packaged and sold in Double Rolls
Easy to follow instructions included in each roll

Lovely and fresh, this open trellis design is a versatile gem, sure to please in any room of the house. Graphic lines hint at Moroccan inspiration with a clean updated look that adds impact to walls while keeping them light and airy. Crisp white backgrounds set the stage for sophisticated trellis accent colors in black, yellow, pink, lavender, turquoise and a soft new gray. Made in the USA.
Double Roll Dimension 20.5 Inches X 33 Feet = 56 Square Feet; Design Repeat: 6.875 Inches; Design Match: Straight
